criteria: Explanation of the Relationship Between Environment and Health
descriptions: The student does not identify any environmental conditions that affect personal health.
The student identifies only one environmental condition with no link to health.
The student identifies one environmental condition and mentions its general effect on health.
The student identifies two environmental conditions and describes their general effects on health.
The student identifies three or more environmental conditions and describes their general effects on health.
The student comprehensively identifies multiple environmental conditions and provides detailed explanations of their effects on personal health, including specific examples.
The student does not describe any health effects related to environmental conditions.
The student vaguely mentions a health effect with no connection to a specific environmental condition.
The student describes a health effect loosely related to an environmental condition.
The student clearly describes a health effect associated with a specific environmental condition.
The student describes multiple health effects accurately linked to specific environmental conditions.
The student provides an in-depth explanation of how environmental conditions impact specific health outcomes, including physiological mechanisms and potential long-term effects.
The student shows no understanding of the relationship between environmental conditions and personal health.
The student attempts to explain the relationship but demonstrates significant misunderstandings.
The student provides a basic explanation of the relationship, but it lacks detail and accuracy.
The student provides a clear explanation of how environmental conditions can affect personal health.
The student effectively explains the complex interplay between environmental factors and personal health outcomes.

The student demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of the multifaceted relationship between environmental conditions and personal health, including discussion of vulnerable populations and preventative measures.
